scripts.container-remove: if docker inspect --type container app-tmpl-vue-express; then docker rm -f app-tmpl-vue-express; else echo 'No existing container'; fi
scripts.run-container: docker run --name app-tmpl-vue-express -i --expose ${PORT:=3000} -p ${PORT:=3000}:${PORT:=3000} --env PORT=${PORT:=3000} --env NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV:=dev} --env BASE_PATH=${BASE_PATH:=/} --volume $(pwd)/lib:/app/lib app-tmpl-vue-express
scripts.prestart-docker: npm test && npm run container-remove && npm run build-dev && npm run create-dist
scripts.test: node_modules/.bin/eslint index.js && node_modules/.bin/eslint lib/front/src && node_modules/.bin/eslint lib/modules && node_modules/.bin/eslint lib/routes && node_modules/.bin/eslint lib/server.js && node_modules/.bin/eslint test && node_modules/.bin/mocha test
